arguments.template:
<sky-list
  [data]="items"
  [defaultView]="grid">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-filter-inline>
      <sky-list-filter-inline-item
        name="fruitType"
        [filter]="fruitTypeFilterFunction"
        value="any"
        defaultValue="any">
        <ng-template let-filter="filter">
          <label for="sky-demo-select-type">Fruit type</label>
          <select
            id="sky-demo-select-type"
            [ngModel]="filter.value"
            (ngModelChange)="filter.changed($event)">
            <option value="any">Any fruit</option>
            <option value="citrus">Citrus</option>
            <option value="berry">Berry</option>
          </select>
        </ng-template>
      </sky-list-filter-inline-item>
      <sky-list-filter-inline-item
        name="hideOrange"
        [filter]="hideOrangeFilterFunction">
        <ng-template let-filter="filter">
          <sky-checkbox
            [ngModel]="filter.value"
            (ngModelChange)="filter.changed($event)">
            <sky-checkbox-label>
              Hide orange fruits
            </sky-checkbox-label>
          </sky-checkbox>
        </ng-template>
      </sky-list-filter-inline-item>
    </sky-list-filter-inline>
  </sky-list-toolbar>
  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="name"
      heading="Name">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="description"
      heading="Description">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>

<sky-list
  [data]="items"
  [defaultView]="grid">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="name"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-filter-inline>
      <sky-list-filter-inline-item
        name="fruitType"
        [filter]="fruitTypeFilterFunction"
        value="any"
        defaultValue="any">
        <ng-template let-filter="filter">
          <label for="sky-demo-select-type">Fruit type</label>
          <select
            id="sky-demo-select-type"
            [ngModel]="filter.value"
            (ngModelChange)="filter.changed($event)">
            <option value="any">Any fruit</option>
            <option value="citrus">Citrus</option>
            <option value="berry">Berry</option>
          </select>
        </ng-template>
      </sky-list-filter-inline-item>
      <sky-list-filter-inline-item
        name="hideOrange"
        [filter]="hideOrangeFilterFunction">
        <ng-template let-filter="filter">
          <sky-checkbox
            [ngModel]="filter.value"
            (ngModelChange)="filter.changed($event)">
            <sky-checkbox-label>
              Hide orange fruits
            </sky-checkbox-label>
          </sky-checkbox>
        </ng-template>
      </sky-list-filter-inline-item>
    </sky-list-filter-inline>
  </sky-list-toolbar>
  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="name"
      heading="Name">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="description"
      heading="Description">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>
